body_html:
@saeta, did you ever look at the gradients. @ankitkv, what did you want it to do? As an aside, you may not want to use a bilinear downsample filter, something like a box area filter (take the destination pixel size and make it into a box that overlaps all pixels on the source image). There's no primitive in tensorflow that does this to my knowledge.

@aselle Thank you. Your comment really helped.

I was expecting the tensorflow bilinear downsampling behavior to be similar to that of pillow's, but apparently it's not. For me the resize_area op seems a better choice.
